Mr. Scarola is still your lawyer; correct? 21 A. I don't believe so. 22 Q. Mr. Scarola represented you in your claim with the Epstein Victim Compensation Fund; correct? 23 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018777
